page.title: 12 Amenities,Stebbing
page.content: Stebbing is a very good village to live in because it has so many amenities. There are six shops which are a general store,Post Office,craft shop,butchers,hairdressers and a curiosity shop. There is a bowling green which is popular with the older people.There are two playing fields at each end of the village.There is a cricket pitch,with a park round the outside with swings. There are two telephone boxes and four post boxes. There is a village hall which can be rented for an evening. There is also Mill Lane Hall which is down Mill Lane.
